Draft Rating:

F

Brian Wright ranks in the 9th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Wright's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 13 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Tre Jones with 41th pick but was worth 36th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Malaki Branham with 20th pick but was worth 45th pick.
  • Drafted Jeremy Sochan with 9th pick but was worth 40th pick.
  • Drafted Joshua Primo with 12th pick but was worth 41th pick.

Brian Wright ranks in the 17th percentile for trading among executives in our database.

Their biggest L:
